item.title: Home Lab Part II : My Setup
item.description: My Homelab is a work horse for me; I use it to train smaller machine learning (tensorflow) models on, mess around with Starcraft AI bots on it, along with doing Information Security research and some light malware analysis/ reverse engineering. Essentially, it is a jack-of-all trades, master of none type of workstation. Going in I had the following requirements: CHEAPâ€¦ I want this to be under $300USD (not counting the GPU)
